output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in buy function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount' variable.
The buy function does not check if the buyer has enough Ether, allowing a potential trap due to a potential integer overflow.
The setPrices function allows attackers to set arbitrary buy prices, aka the 'adminPrice' vulnerability.
The selfdestructs function allows attackers to destroy the contract, aka the 'tradeTrap' vulnerability.
